channel.title: Drug Testing
channel.description:
I plan to apply for the Australian Defence Force in 8 days or so (of course the testing isn't in 8 days. A month or two i would say). I did marijuana three days ago but i'm not a frequent user. Once or twice a month. When will it be safe to be drug tested?
Google came up with mixed results.

item.title: Drug Testing
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

niacin is B3, B6 is not niacin

its also never been proven niacin helps remove toxins or metabolites or anything really. some people like to try it though, so go for it. just dont go crazy, partly cuz niacin overdose isnt that great for you but mainly because itll show up in your piss and theyll know you were trying to hide something

Read full topic

item.title: Drug Testing
item.dc:creator: @Square Square
item.description:
@Square wrote:

A big help is drinks with niacin in it. Redbull has a lot, I forgot how much but I recommend it. And 3 months is rediculous for a durration. I’d have to agree with jme, about 2 weeks or so if you do it 2 or 3 times a month.

As for the niacin thing, here’s a quote from wiki:

Niacin, prescribed in doses between 1000 and 2000 mg two to three times daily, [14] blocks the breakdown of fats in adipose tissue, more specifically the very-low-density lipoprotein (VLDL), precursor of low-density lipoprotein (LDL) or "bad" cholesterol. Because niacin blocks breakdown of fats, it causes a decrease in free fatty acids in the blood and, as a consequence, decreased secretion of VLDL and cholesterol by the liver.[15]
It breaks down fats, it's fat soluable to it thins it out i guess you could say. So applying this to what jme said, just figure what it does.

niacin can also be found on drinks as vitamin B3 or B6

Read full topic

item.title: Drug Testing
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

You’ll be almost certainly fine on a pisstest much sooner than a month. If you’re not a frequent user the metabolites are gone from piss pretty damn fast, frequent use is where you have to start worrying about it storing in lipids and whatnot.

Mopar is right btw, it can be detected in hair for anywhere between 3 months and the lifetime of the hair (!) and they can use any hair, so shaving your head isn’t much good unless you feel like having your pubes ripped out.

Luckily however, hair testing is still somewhat rare.

Read full topic

item.title: Drug Testing
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Ah, okay. I suppose the test will not be within a month or so. Thanks for all the help. Much appreciated.

Read full topic

item.title: Drug Testing
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:8, topic:275271”]Is it true that drinking alot of water helps?

Seems to make some sense

Atleast for pee tests[/quote]

It can dilute it. Large amounts of water before a test can dilute your piss, but they aren’t stupid and they will know that you purposly tried to dilute it.

  • THC is not water soluble, so it doesn’t help much really.

Read full topic

item.title: Drug Testing
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:

item.title: Drug Testing
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:6, topic:275271”][quote author=Original Daniel link=topic=363641.msg2761702#msg2761702 date=1240580967]
It depends on your body type, but roughly 3 months.

I think it’s gone from your blood pretty quickly, and it’s the urine that has it for ages. You could always use a friends piss, tape a bag of it to yourself maybe.

What are you doing in the ADF?
[/quote]

It’s your fat that stores it, not urine. Small amounts are released into your urine. After about 1 month it’s nearly impossible to detect unless they do other tests. If your not a heavy toker than 2 weeks should be more than enough.

Lots of exercise can speed it up too, but don’t exercise too much when your getting close to the test.[/quote]

Always trust our local druggy jme. =D If your unsure i agree with the bring a bag of friends piss

Read full topic

item.title: Drug Testing
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Original Daniel, post:2, topic:275271”]It depends on your body type, but roughly 3 months.

I think it’s gone from your blood pretty quickly, and it’s the urine that has it for ages. You could always use a friends piss, tape a bag of it to yourself maybe.

What are you doing in the ADF?[/quote]

It’s your fat that stores it, not urine. Small amounts are released into your urine. After about 1 month it’s nearly impossible to detect unless they do other tests. If your not a heavy toker than 2 weeks should be more than enough.

Lots of exercise can speed it up too, but don’t exercise too much when your getting close to the test.

Read full topic
